content: this crochet pattern includes 9 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used lion brand zz twist #4 medium weight yarn crochet hook size 5 mm scissors yarn needle notes this pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this tank top is designed to be a loose fit this tank top is made in two versions a cropped version and longer version this crochet pattern is made from the top down in this picture i have demonstrated with size small cropped version gauge blocked 2 pattern repeat 2 lace shell + 3 double_crochet + 4 chain space = 4 7 row = 4 yarn needed the cropped version = 240 270 310 350 390 420 yards the longer version = 380 410 450 490 530 560 yards measurements after blocked the length does not include the strap the cropped version = 7 48 7 48 8 8 57 9 14 9 71 long the longer version = 10 28 10 28 10 85 11 42 12 12 long circumference both versions are the same = 48 52 56 60 64 68 thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
